## Box type

[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-backgrounds/\#typedef-box](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-backgrounds/#typedef-box)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Box = Keyword<"border-box"> | Keyword<"padding-box"> | Keyword<"content-box">;
```
